rukus.text: 75|31|to na usane saty ko maana aur na namaaz padhee.
75|33|phir, gaya apane parijanon kee or akadata haa.
75|34|shok hai tere lie, phir shok hai.
75|35|phir shok hai tere lie, phir shok hai.
75|36|kya manushy samajhata hai ki vah chhod diya jaayega vyarth
75|37|kya vah nahin tha veery kee boond, jo (garbhaashay mein) boond-boond giraee jaatee hai.
75|38|phir vah bandha rakt hua, phir allaah ne use paida kiya aur use baraabar banaaya.
75|39|phir usaka jodaah nar aur naaree banaaya.
75|40|to kya vah saamarthyavaan nahin ki murdon ko jeevit kar de
